verbs.description: jones - gustafsson 2 [V: set] [ARG2: for light heavyweight title] [ARGM-LOC: at ufc 232] jon jones has a return date and an opponent jones will step back into the octagon in a rematch with alexander gustafsson for the light heavyweight title at ufc 232 in december espn ariel helwani reports citing multiple sources close to the promotion espn ufc jon jones alexander gustafsson ariel helwani jon jones fighter ultimate fighting championship daniel cormier
